source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a tranquil scenery shot capturing the surface of a body of water. The deep purple water is covered in small, uniform ripples. These ripples flow gently and continuously, creating a mesmerizing and calming pattern.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a tranquil scenery shot capturing the surface of a body of water. The deep purple water is covered in small, uniform ripples. These ripples flow gently and continuously, creating a mesmerizing and calming pattern.

bad_caption: A group of brightly colored fish swim in synchronized patterns just below the surface, occasionally leaping out of the water in unison. Their coordinated movements create splashes and waves that spread outward, while a single turtle glides slowly across the scene, weaving between the fish.
